plot: Between Turkey and Germany, the filmmaker films his Kurdish parents and grandparents. Facing the language barrier, she brings to light the link between forgetting and building an identity.
title: Dilim dönmüyor
plot_es: Between Turkey and Germany, the filmmaker films his Kurdish parents and grandparents. Facing the language barrier, she brings to light the link between forgetting and building an identity.
plot_en: Between Turkey and Germany, the filmmaker films his Kurdish parents and grandparents. Facing the language barrier, she brings to light the link between forgetting and building an identity.
